summary: Click the connect button and I'll jump on a quick call with you! Stay safe and have a great day.
headline:
Certified Salesforce Expert |
Sr. React Native Developer

educations.description: Accounting for Leaders, Managerial Finance, Marketing Strategies, Leadership & Change in Org, Operational Planning & Policy

position.title: Certified Salesforce Admin, Developer & Marketing Operations Manager

multiLocaleTitle.en_US: Certified Salesforce Admin, Developer & Marketing Operations Manager

position.description:
‚úÖCertified Salesforce Developer
‚úÖCertified Salesforce Administrator
‚úÖCertified Salesforce Marketing Cloud Specialist

position.title: Salesforce Admin & Developer
position.description:
‚Ä¢ Successfully migrated the business process from Microsoft CRM to Salesforce CRM.
‚Ä¢ Developing the new requirement on Salesforce as per business needs.
‚Ä¢ Analyzed business requirements, entity relationships and converting to Salesforce custom objects.
‚Ä¢ Maintaining the security level and configuration on Salesforce. 
‚Ä¢ Implemented Apex Triggers for top-level standard objects such as Contacts, and Accounts.
‚Ä¢ Developed Visual Force pages to implement custom functionality. 
‚Ä¢ Implemented various validation rules and workflows.
‚Ä¢ Worked on the Agile Scrum model aimed at adaptability and customer satisfaction.
‚Ä¢ Configured user security permissions in compliance with organizational needs to fulfill HIPAA rules.

position.title: React Native Developer
position.description:
üöÄConsider me if you need to:
- Build iOS & Android Mobile app using React Native, Flutter, Redux, Expo, Firebase.
- Build Rest Api using NodeJS + Firebase Admin SDK etc.
- Build Server side rendered Web App using Node.js + React.js + Next.js + Angular.js + Vue.js + Koa.
- Integrate GraphQL or Rest Api within Mobile App.
- Integrate Firebase Auth (Email/Pass, Facebook, Google, Twitter).
- Design Database using Cloud Fire Store, Realtime Database.
- Integrate Stripe Payment Gateway.
- Integrate Firebase Realtime Database for Chat App Implementation.
- Location Tracking during different stages/modes of App.
- Firebase Push Notification.
- Upgrade React Native to Make App Live.

iOS App Development & Android App Development

Front End: JavaScript (ES5 and ES6) | React | React-Native | Redux | React Hooks | React Saga | React Fetch | JSX | Sqlite | Realm
Back End: Node.js | Express | MySQL | PostgreSQL | RESTful API Development | Firebase
Testing/Deployment: Mocha | Chai | Jest | Artillery | Loader.io | Amazon AWS | Firebase | Docker
Developer Tools: GitHub | npm | Webpack | Agile Methodology | TDD

position.title: Senior Business Development Manager
position.description:
‚óè Managing online bidding portals ‚Äì Upwork, formerly Elance ‚Äì oDesk, Freelancer, Guru, PeoplePerHour and AppFutura.
‚óè Identifying the specific needs of customers, and then creating bespoke solutions.
‚óè Responsible for driving business and sales growth by acquire new business opportunities through
different channels.
‚óè Responsible for converting the leads into business and ensuring monthly targets are
achieved.

position.companyName: Rapidsoft Technologies - Mobile & Web Application Development
position.title: Business Development Manager

multiLocaleCompanyName.en_US: Rapidsoft Technologies - Mobile & Web Application Development

position.description:
I was handling the responsibilities of maintaining steady stream of revenue for the
organization by bringing new mobile based software development projects.

‚óè Managing the Pre-Sales team to ensure a sufficiently healthy leads pipeline and funnel.
‚óè Finding alternate source of business development including SEO & Pre-Sales Leads.
‚óè Generating Pre-Sales leads through Email Marketing.
‚óè Submitting online forms on online directories like Yelp, Entireweb, Viesearch, and Yellowpages.
‚óè Finding fresh data from Google and Yahoo for Email Marketing.
‚óè Advertising in social media networks for SEO leads.

items.title: Health Case Study (Community Hospital)
items.description:
‚Ä¢ Performed risk assessments to help create optimal prevention and management plans.
‚Ä¢ Make recommendations for mitigating the identified risk.
‚Ä¢ Researched, planned and implemented business process and technical controls that reduced data loss.
‚Ä¢ Developed and managed risk scenarios based on the network details provided
‚Ä¢ Assessed the incoming threats and vulnerabilities and developed plans to close the loopholes

contributors.headline:
Certified Salesforce Expert |
Sr. React Native Developer

items.title: Patient Healthcare System
items.description:
‚Ä¢ Devised & constructed an ER model featuring different functionalities related to patient varying from getting admitted, medication details, family history and surrogate details etc.

‚Ä¢ Planned & developed a form using Salesforce standard and custom objects to ease the user experience after making it for the employees to enter the patient details from the front end. Inserted data through backend in Salesforce by using data loader.
